title: Sure, here's a list of 20 influential articles on commonsense reasoning in Natural Language Processing (NLP) up to 2020
**"Commonsense Reasoning and Commonsense Knowledge in Artificial Intelligence"**

author.literal: **"Winograd Schemas Challenge"** - Hector Levesque, Ernest Davis, and Leora Morgenstern

title: **"Recurrent Entity Networks: An Approach to Abstract Reasoning"** - Adam Trischler
note: Zheng Ye, Xingdi Yuan, Philip Bachman, Alessandro Sordoni, Kaheer Suleman, 2016.

title: **"Commonsense Knowledge Base Construction"** - Robert Speer and Catherine Havasi
**"ConceptNet 5: A Large Semantic Network for Relational Knowledge"** - Robert Speer, Catherine Havasi
**"Reasoning about Actions and Change: A Survey"**
**"The Winograd Schema Challenge and Machine Commonsense"**
Commonsense Transformers for Automatic Knowledge Graph Construction"** - Antoine Bosselut
note: Hannah Rashkin, Maarten Sap, Chaitanya Malaviya, Asli Celikyilmaz, Yejin Choi, 2019.

title: **"SWAG: A Large-Scale Adversarial Dataset for Grounded Commonsense Inference"**
**"Story Cloze Test: A New Benchmark for Story Understanding and Generation"** - Nasrin Mostafazadeh
publisher: Nathanael Chambers, Xiaodong He, Devi Parikh, Dhruv Batra, Lucy Vanderwende, Pushmeet Kohli, James Allen

title: **"Event2Mind: Commonsense Inference on Events, Intents, and Reactions"**
**"ATOMIC: An Atlas of Machine Commonsense for If-Then Reasoning"**
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** - Jacob Devlin
**"RoBERTa: A Robustly Optimized BERT Pretraining Approach"** - Yinhan Liu, Myle Ott
note: Naman Goyal, Jingfei Du, Mandar Joshi, Danqi Chen, Omer Levy, Mike Lewis, Luke Zettlemoyer, Veselin Stoyanov, 2019.

title: **"ALBERT: A Lite BERT for Self-supervised Learning of Language Representations"**
note: Zhenzhong Lan, Mingda Chen, Sebastian Goodman, Kevin Gimpel, Piyush Sharma, Radu Soricut, 2019.

title: **"T5: Exploring the Limits of Transfer Learning with a Unified Text-to-Text Transformer"** - Colin Raffel, Noam Shazeer, Adam Roberts
publisher: Michael Matena, Yanqi Zhou, Wei Li, Peter J. Liu

title: **"GPT-2: Better Language Models and Their Implications"** - Alec Radford, Jeffrey Wu, Rewon Child
**"NarrativeQA: Reading Comprehension Challenge with Human-Written Summaries"** - Tomáš Kočiský, Jonathan Schwarz, Phil Blunsom, Chris Dyer
publisher: Karl Moritz Hermann, Gábor Melis, Edward Grefenstette

title: **"CommonsenseQA: A Question Answering Challenge Targeting Commonsense Knowledge"** - Alon Talmor
publisher: Jonathan Herzig, Nicholas Lourie, Jonathan Berant

title: **"Social IQa: Commonsense Reasoning about Social Interactions"** - Maarten Sap, Hannah Rashkin
publisher: Derek Chen, Ronan Le Bras, Yejin Choi

title: These articles cover a range of topics and methodologies in commonsense reasoning within NLP, from foundational theories and challenges to specific datasets and models
